name: Tread Lightly (Kjmagpuri)
description:
The Scavenger has been chosen to travel beyond the Warren walls. The Scavenger must trek across through the castle remains in order to bring much needed food back to the starving Warren. What lays before him is a treacherous waste overtaken by abominations unseen. Tread lightly oh small one... 

Tread Lightly is a horror-platformer made in Unreal Engine 5. This game was built over the course of 10 weeks by a team of 4 as a single-level demo for Applied Game Design at the Savannah College of Art and Design. 

Kano Magpuri - Project Lead & Systems Designer 

Abigail Satchell - 3D Modeler & Character Artist 

Ray Turpin - Cinematics & Character Animation 

Shannon Davis - Level Designer & 2D Artist
